creator: FJS Tech. pvt. ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Rheo is a live streaming platform for the gaming community in India.

With Rheo, you can watch livestream gaming videos, engage with streamers and also request to play with them. Also, get access to exclusive tournaments & e-sports events hosted & participated by top gamers in India.

Stream your favourite games from PC, Xbox One or any Android smartphone.

What’s the fun in playing action games alone? Join Rheo and become a part of the growing community of gamers! Catch the best gameplay, interact with top gamers, learn from them, have lots of fun and improve your skills, craft in popular games to become the best.

Come join the community today and enjoy viewing thousands of action packed streams available on the platform in various languages and win exciting real game rewards like UC money and top-ups for different games using Rheo coins.


*Rheo is featured in reputed publications*

“Rheo is building an ecosystem for mobile gamers where they can stream, watch & comment” - Economic Times
“Rheo allows more than 100 different games to be streamed on its platform” - Doris Yu, Tech In Asia
“Rheo is a game streaming platform where gamers can create channels to monetise their passion for playing mobile games” - Bhumika Khatri, Inc42
“Rheo’s mission is to build a highly entertaining ecosystem for mobile gamers” - Sindhu Kashyaap, Yourstory


Rheo: India’s own live streaming gaming platform - Top features of the app!

*Watch live videos* - You can watch the gaming community including top gamers in the country come together to play your favourite games.


*Live chat* - You can talk to your favorite gamers and have a conversation with them via our live chat window using custom designed chat stickers. You can also talk to fellow gamers anytime during the live gaming session.


*Request to play* - You can request to play with your favourite game streamer and join their clan and fight battles. And, if you end up on the winning side, then.. Winner winner chicken dinner.


*Win real game rewards* - Collect Rheo coins by watching videos and redeem the rheo coins for real game rewards such as UC money and game top ups.


*Become a pro gamer* - You can start broadcasting your own gaming content on Rheo in a few simple steps. Start streaming and start growing your followers. Stardom is awaiting you!

Gaming is the new prime time in India. We at Rheo believe that everyone playing games on their smartphones can be great entertainers. If you are a hardcore gamer, think you belong to the best league of gamers, then go on start streaming and show the world what you’re made of.

If you’ve any suggestions or feedback regarding our android app, please feel free to write to us at contactus@rheotv.com and we will look into it immediately. We value your opinion, thank you.

💬Live chat - You can talk to your favorite gamers and have a conversation with them via our live chat window using custom designed chat stickers. You can also talk to fellow gamers anytime during the live gaming session.

🎬Short Clips- Discover the best of the Indian gaming content in 15 to 30 seconds short clips.


📆Story-Now you will be to see what goes in your favorite streamers life outside Live streams through story feature that disappear in 24 hours and be able to better connect with them.


🤩Become a pro streamer - You can start broadcasting your own gaming content on Rheo seamlessly with a few simple taps from PC, Xbox One or any smartphone and Showcase your gaming talent to the Rheo Community. So what are you waiting for, Start streaming now on Rheo and grow your followers instantly. Stardom is awaiting you!
